function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of trained rapid-response team to deal with suspected cases","Impact":"Difficulty in identifying and containing suspected cases, leading to potential spread of the disease","Mitigation":"Implement training programs and drills for rapid-response teams, and ensure adequate staffing levels","Technologies":"Training modules, simulation software for drills","People":"Patients, hospital staff, public","Owner":"Hospital management, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Inadequate infection control measures for medical staff and patients","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission within the hospital environment","Mitigation":"Enforce strict infection control protocols, provide adequate PPE, and implement regular training for medical staff","Technologies":"PPE, disinfection equipment, infection control software","People":"Medical staff, patients, visitors","Owner":"Infection control team, hospital management"},{"Description":"Lack of proper equipment in ambulances and morgues for infection control","Impact":"Risk of disease transmission during transportation and handling of deceased patients","Mitigation":"Equip ambulances and morgues with necessary supplies, provide training on infection control measures, and establish regular maintenance protocols","Technologies":"Hand sanitizers, disinfection pumps, refrigeration equipment","People":"Paramedics, morgue staff, public","Owner":"Hospital management, ambulance services"}]}
